name: Pixel Punk Prototype
description:
Controls:
Movement: WASD + Space
Shoot and Aim: Mouse Position and Left Mouse Button
Pause: Escape

This is just a Prototype!

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme Strong Together.

You have to use both characters (the former opera singer and the crazy scientist) to escape a weird facility in which they found themselves.

*** v0.01 ***
For the moment only the Doc exists, you can switch to a place holder character with [TAB] but it does not do anything at the moment.

Level Wise the first Level is almost done as well as the last Level. The second one, with enemies and basic platforms, is generally only a placeholder for future levels.

The core gameplay should consist of a fighting part for which the opera singer (the brute) is used and a puzzle part for which the Doc and his special "Liquid Gun" should be used. For the first version only the Doc and his gun exist, which can be used to damage enemies (right now also only place holders).

Everything was done by:

Programming: SchuhFiedel - https://schuhfiedel.itch.io/
Game Art: Dominopl - https://dominopl.itch.io/
Game Art: Raphiiee - https://raphiiee.itch.io/
